General Product Safety Regulation & Product safety

The General Product Safety Regulation (GPSR) is a recent EU regulation designed to ensure the safety of consumer products sold in the EU market. To comply, manufacturers are required to offer clear guidance and warnings for their products, assess possible risks, and maintain traceability of their items.

You can also access this information directly on the product pages when browsing through my Etsy shop.

All designs are original creations, made by Stefánia, the owner of Art Of Cataflame, and are made in Hungary. These products are not suitable for children under 3 years old.

Art prints

Used materials
Paper and ink.

Risks & safety
Small risk of paper cuts, flammable object.

Proper use
For decorative use only! Remove item carefully from the package.

Risk management
Use this for decorative purposes only, and handle with care. Keep away from children under 3 years old. This item is not a toy. Keep away from fire and other heat sources.

Bookmarks

Used materials
Paper, ink, matte laminating foil for durability. Some bookmarks might have a tassel attached, see product page for details.

Risks & safety
Small risk of paper cuts, flammable object, small parts may pose a choking hazard.

Proper use
Place the bookmark between book pages to track your reading progress. For decorative purposes only!

Risk management
Use this for decorative purposes only, and handle with care. Keep away from children under 3 years old. This item is not a toy. Keep away from fire and other heat sources.

Calendars

Used materials
Paper, cardboard backing, ink, wire binding coil, metallic hanger.

Risks & safety
Small risk of paper cuts, flammable object, small parts may pose a choking hazard.

Proper use
Hang the calendar on a wall or place it on a desk. Remove item carefully from the package.

Risk management
Hang the calendar on a wall or place it on a desk. Handle with care. Keep away from children under 3 years old. This item is not a toy. Keep away from fire and other heat sources.

Notepads

Used materials
Paper, ink, paper glue, cardboard backing.

Risks & safety
Small risk of paper cuts, flammable object.

Proper use
Use notepads for jotting down notes, reminders, or ideas. Remove item carefully from the package.

Risk management
Use notepads for jotting down notes, reminders, or ideas. Handle with care. Keep away from children under 3 years old. This item is not a toy. Keep away from fire and other heat sources.

Stickers Used materials
Self-adhesive sticker paper, ink, protective plastic coating.

Risks & safety
Small risk of paper cuts, flammable object, small parts may pose a choking hazard.

Proper use
For decorative use only! Remove the sticker from the backing paper and apply it to your desired surface. Not suitable for outdoor use, and it's not dishwasher safe. Handle the item carefully when removing from packaging.

Risk management
Use this for decorative purposes only, and handle with care. Keep away from children under 3 years old. This item is not a toy. Keep away from fire and other heat sources.

Sticker sheets Used materials
Self-adhesive sticker paper, ink, some may have a protective plastic coating.

Risks & safety
Small risk of paper cuts, flammable object, small parts may pose a choking hazard.

Proper use
For decorative use only! Remove the sticker from the backing paper and apply it to your desired surface. Not waterproof. Handle the item carefully when removing from packaging.

Risk management
Use this for decorative purposes only, and handle with care. Keep away from children under 3 years old. This item is not a toy. Keep away from fire and other heat sources.

Technical and safety information for packaging

To ensure the safety of items during shipping, plastic packaging may be used. Whenever possible, paper packaging is utilized to minimize the environmental impact of my business.

The materials I use for packing may vary over time, but this could include, but not limited to:

  • Plastic bubble wrap: choking hazard, flammable object.
  • Paper wrapping material: risk of paper cuts, flammable object.
  • Washi-tape: choking hazard, flammable object.
  • Cardboard sheets to prevent prints from bending: risk of paper cuts, flammable object.
  • Freebies included with your order, such as stickers, and mini art prints: risk of paper cuts, flammable object, choking hazard.

If you have any questions, feedback, or inquiries about any of the items, please don't hesitate to reach out using the form in the Contact menu. If an issue is found with a batch or line of products, I will take note and remove the affected items from sale immediately. In such cases, you are welcome to contact me directly at the form.
